paper_abstract: We present a program for the numerical evaluation of form factors entering the calculation of one-loop amplitudes with up to six external legs. The program is written in Fortran95 and performs the reduction to a certain set of basis integrals numerically. using a formalism where inverse Gram determinants can be avoided. It can be used to Calculate one-loop amplitudes with massless internal particles in a fast and numerically stable way.
paper_title: golem95: A numerical program to calculate one-loop tensor integrals with up to six external legs
